boilerplate.pages.Home.simple: A simpler RFP, All in the cloud
boilerplate.pages.Home.title: Large group quoting simplified
boilerplate.pages.Home.description: A web-based platform that unifies the quoting process from end to end across all stakeholders and lines of business
boilerplate.pages.Home.title2: The insurance process in the cloud.
boilerplate.pages.Home.quoting.title: Expedited quoting
boilerplate.pages.Home.quoting.message: Submit an RFP and get a quote instantly. No more paper, no more manual work, no more waiting.
boilerplate.pages.Home.compare.title: Compare on the fly
boilerplate.pages.Home.compare.message: Shop across every plan and network option available. Its all accessible by a simple click of a button.
boilerplate.pages.Home.presentations.mes: Break away from limitations. Provide your client with a dynamic comparison experience beyond what you can do on a spreadsheet.
boilerplate.pages.Home.benefits.title: Benefits for the carrier
boilerplate.pages.Home.benefits.1: Decrease the cost of customer acquisition
boilerplate.pages.Home.benefits.2: Expand access to your broad product portfolio
boilerplate.pages.Home.solution.title: A unique solution for large group
boilerplate.pages.Home.solution.message: The large group space is unique. This segment of the employee benefits market has unique products as well as unique challenges. We offer a unique solution.
boilerplate.pages.Home.solution.message2: BenRevo is the first comprehensive technology solution for large group.
boilerplate.pages.Carriers.title: BenRevo for Carriers
boilerplate.pages.Carriers.description: Still sending PDF quotes? Let BenRevo bring your organization online.
boilerplate.pages.Carriers.message: Insurance carriers are tied down by legacy systems that inhibit them from providing their brokers and customers with a digital shopping experience. BenRevo's technology can sit alongside your legacy software and bring your entire RFP, quoting and onboarding process online.
boilerplate.pages.Carriers.benefit1.mess: BenRevo will drive savings by automating manual tasks currently performed in pre-sale, UW and installation.
boilerplate.pages.Carriers.benefit2.mess: Enhance the customer experience while improving speed to market, speed to quote and speed to bound policy.
boilerplate.pages.Carriers.benefit3.mess: Display all products through dynamic online quoting rather then antiquated paper proposals. Promote your brand beyond what’s capable in a spreadsheet.
boilerplate.pages.Carriers.benefit4.mess: BenRevo will capture data and provide analytics to help insurance carriers constantly evolve their sales and distribution strategies.
boilerplate.pages.Carriers.process.title: Automate the process
boilerplate.pages.Carriers.process.messa: Our technology will automate the fragmented distribution process between the broker, insurance carrier and employer by bringing it all online.
boilerplate.pages.Brokers.title: BenRevo for Brokers
boilerplate.pages.Brokers.description: BenRevo simplifies and streamlines the entire process, from RFP through implementation.
boilerplate.pages.Brokers.message: Today's insurance brokers face a market with new demands and challenges while their resources stay unchanged. Let BenRevo help.
boilerplate.pages.Brokers.efficiency.par: Eliminates the duplication of work that accompanies the current outdated process.
No more back and forth between brokers and carriers. We ask everything needed to receive a quote upfront in the RFP.
Overall increase in workforce productivity results in decreased operating costs.
boilerplate.pages.Brokers.comparison.par: Provide your clients with access to superior analytical and decision support tools so they can make informed decisions for their employee benefits program.
Built in HMO network comparisons provide complete transparency.
boilerplate.pages.Brokers.solution.title: Comprehensive solution
boilerplate.pages.Brokers.solution.messa: Our tools allow you to perform every step of the process in one place, from RFP to implementation.
boilerplate.pages.About.title: We are here to create a benefits revolution by automating the insurance process and saving you time and money
boilerplate.pages.About.paragraph1: The idea for BenRevo was formed when Jimson, an 8-year veteran of the insurance industry, was explaining the current carrier and broker sales process to Ojas and Jason. For Ojas and Jason, who had spent the last 25 years building tax automation software at TurboTax, it was easy to see the parallels between tax and insurance. It was obvious there was a better way for insurance carriers to deliver products to market. By automating the current process and bringing it online, BenRevo could improve the way benefit policies are quoted, purchased and implemented.
boilerplate.pages.About.paragraph2: The BenRevo team consists of experienced insurance and technology professionals, the joining of which creates a unique atmosphere that fosters creativity and innovation. Our technology is built using industry leading best practices to ensure customer goals are achieved.
